import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import './style.css' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' const whitelist = ["0x641509605fbfbf3f73992a0693effdbf77edc558", "0x07abe5d6245e24db3a7cfe17f6fbbae7531f2d0e","0x5A8043A7907C3A5c40ae52CfF3abC026111CCd96","0x5A8da67D96AD334CDf78e3221029E8E26DbdF363"]; export default function Home() { const history = useHistory(); const [address,setaddress] = useState([]); const [wallet,setWallet] = useState("Install Metamask"); if(wallet == "Install Metamask"){ if(typeof window.ethereum !== 'undefined'){ setWallet("Connect MetaMask"); } } let link = async (history,ethereum) => { if(typeof window.ethereum !== 'undefined'){ const accounts = await window.ethereum.request({ method: 'eth_requestAccounts' }); // if(!(whitelist.includes(accounts[0].toLowerCase()))) { // console.log("Account not whitelisted") // return; // } window.sessionStorage.setItem("address", accounts[0]); setaddress(accounts[0]); console.log(address); history.push({ pathname:'/dashboard', state: { accounts: accounts}} ); } else{ setWallet("Install Metamask"); } } const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const saveEmail = () => { console.log(email); } return (
